message:
SYSTEM: ODPs-v7.pdf: Página 19
22 
22 
Example 1 
We are going to model the following problem within the Anatomy 
Ontology:  

The Knee is part of the Leg 

The Front of the Knee is part of the Knee 

The Front of the Knee also forms part of the Leg  

The same for other parts of the body 
The Content Pattern for modelling a Part-Whole Relation (CP-PW-01) was 
reused to structure the different parts of the body and the relation among them.
